role.argrole: thing arg1 is forced to do

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 绝对)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 能) (VP (PP-MNR (P 以) (NP (DNP (NP (PN 自己)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 专业)))) (VP (VV 强迫) (NP-OBJ (NN 他人)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (PP-MNR (P 按照) (NP (DNP (NP (PN 你)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 节奏)))) (VP (VV 起舞)))))))))
example.arg: *PRO* 按照 你 的 节奏 起舞
以 自己 的 专业

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 必) (VP (VV 强迫)))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 必) (VP (ADVP (AD 痛苦)) (VP (VV 练球))))) (PU ，) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (CS 只要)) (VP (VV 喜欢)))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VV 可) (VP (VV 打好) (NP-OBJ (NN 球)))))))
